channel.title: CVE Feed for Johnson Controls -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Johnson Controls -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4804|2023-11-10T22:17:55.249Z -- johnson%20controls -- quantum%20hd%20unity%20compressor
item.description: An unauthorized user could access debug features in Quantum HD Unity products that were accidentally exposed.

item.title: CVE-2023-4486|2023-12-19T16:57:41.349Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20nae55%2Fsne%2Fsnc
item.description:
Under certain circumstances, invalid authentication credentials could be sent to the login endpoint of Johnson Controls Metasys NAE55, SNE, and SNC engines prior to
versions 11.0.6 and 12.0.4
and Facility Explorer F4-SNC engines prior to versions 11.0.6 and 12.0.4 to cause denial-of-service.

item.title: CVE-2023-3548|2023-07-25T13:01:04.564Z -- johnson%20controls -- iq%20wifi%206
item.description: An unauthorized user could gain account access to IQ Wifi 6 versions prior to 2.0.2 by conducting a brute force authentication attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-2025|2023-05-18T20:50:36.726Z -- johnson%20controls -- openblue%20enterprise%20manager%20data%20collector
item.description: OpenBlue Enterprise Manager Data Collector versions prior to 3.2.5.75 may expose sensitive information to an unauthorized user under certain circumstances.

item.title: CVE-2023-2024|2023-05-18T20:45:01.376Z -- johnson%20controls -- openblue%20enterprise%20manager%20data%20collector
item.description: Improper authentication in OpenBlue Enterprise Manager Data Collector versions prior to 3.2.5.75 allow access to an unauthorized user under certain circumstances.

item.title: CVE-2024-0912|2024-06-06T13:29:07.270Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20c%E2%80%A2cure%209000
item.description: Under certain circumstances the Microsoft® Internet Information Server (IIS) used to host the C•CURE 9000 Web Server will log Microsoft Windows credential details within logs. There is no impact to non-web service interfaces C•CURE 9000 or prior versions

item.title: CVE-2024-32752|2024-06-07T16:15:20.239Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20istar%20pro%2C%20icu
item.description: Under certain circumstances communications between the ICU tool and an iSTAR Pro door controller is susceptible to Machine-in-the-Middle attacks which could impact door control and configuration.
